message: CONGRATULATIONS! You won $1000. Click here to claim now.
IRS ALERT: Your account is suspended. Immediate action required.
Please submit your assignment to professor@harvard.edu by Friday.
Hey, can we meet for lunch? It is urgent.
Attached is the syllabus for the class of 2025.
Free entry to win. Text WIN to 12345.

ATTN: BENEFICIARY,

I am contacting you with great confidence and trust regarding a Abandoned sum of $18,500,000.00 USD (Eighteen Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars) currently sitting in the Suspense Account of our Overseas Bank. This fund belonged to a deceased client who shares your same Last Name and unfortunately died in a tragic plane crash with no Legal heir. The Board of Directors has mandated me to locate the Next of Kin or the funds will be reverted to the Government Treasury. I have decided to contact you to stand as the Next of Kin so we can split the transfer 50/50. This transaction is 100% risk free and legal. Kindly get back to me immediately with your Full Name, Direct Phone Number, and Bank Details to proceed. Please keep this STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL for security reasons.

Waiting for your urgent response, Dr. George Barrister

Subject: PART TIME OFFER: $850/Weekly

Dear Candidate,

We reviewed your resume online and you are a perfect fit for our open position of Administrative Assistant. This is a remote role that requires only 1-2 hours of your time per day. You will receive $850 weekly to handle simple tasks like printing checks and mailing supplies.

No interview is required. We are looking to hire immediately. If you are honest and hardworking, please contact the Hiring Manager, Mrs. Smith, via WhatsApp at +1 (555) 019-2834 to receive your first assignment.

Sincerely, HR Dept

Subject: Upcoming charge for your Adobe Creative Cloud subscription

Hi Jamie,

Just a heads up that your annual subscription for Adobe Creative Cloud is set to renew on January 15, 2026.

The renewal price will be $59.99.

If you want to continue using the service, no action is needed. If you’d like to manage your plan or turn off auto-renew, simply visit your Account Settings before the renewal date.

Thanks, The Adobe Team

Subject: INVOICE: Your Subscription Renewed Successfully - #99821

Dear Customer,

Thank you for choosing Geek Squad Protection. This email is to notify you that your annual plan has been auto-renewed today.

An amount of $499.99 USD has been debited from your account. If you did not authorize this purchase or wish to cancel to receive a refund, you must call our Billing Department immediately at:

+1 (808) 555-0199

Do not reply to this email. Customer Care Team

Subject: Presentation slides for Friday

From: Michael Scott (mscott@dundermifflin.com)

Hey,

I'm currently in a meeting with the regional managers, but I realized I forgot to add the sales figures to the Q4 deck.

Could you please pull the numbers from the shared drive and add them to slide 12? I need this ready for review by 3 PM.

Thanks, Michael

Subject: Q3 Performance Metrics - North Region

Hi Team,

Here are the finalized numbers for the third quarter.

Total Revenue: $142,500.50 (up 4.2% from Q2)

New Customer Acquisition: 18 clients

Average Deal Size: $7,916

Churn Rate: 1.5% (Target was < 2%)

We are currently $12,000 ahead of the year-end projection. Let's aim to close the remaining 3 contracts by December 20th.

Best, Jennifer
